definitions.definition: a piece of land surrounded by water.
examples: isle, islet; Moreatoll; archipelago "she lived on an island"Moreatoll; archipelago she lived on an island

definitions.definition: a thing resembling an island, especially in being isolated, detached, or surrounded in some way.
examples: the university is the last island of democracy in this country

definitions.definition: a freestanding kitchen cupboard unit with a countertop, allowing access from all sides.
a detached portion of tissue or group of cells.
make into or like an island; place or enclose on or as on an island; isolate.
examples: islanded among the new stores, these houses were valuable property
synonyms: cut off "he was islanded from the problems of real life"
